name: Notion Smart Goals Tracker
description: Achieve Your Goals Smartly with Notion SMART Goals TrackerAn all-in-one Notion template to set goals, evaluate them, and set & track habits to achieve them.What are SMART Goals?SMART Goals stands for Specific, Measurable, Actionable, Realistic, and Time-Bound Goals.S → SpecificThe mistake most people make while setting a goal (mostly long-term) is making it really vague. For instance, increasing typing speed. Instead, create a very specific goal.M → MeasurableOnce you have set a specific goa
